concept.title: Default Metric Alerts
concept.shortdesc: The provides default metric alerts for a pipeline. The metric alerts are not active. You can edit, delete, or activate the alerts.

conbody.p:
The provides the following metric alerts:
High Incidence of Bad Records - Provides an alert when the number of error records generated by the pipeline passes 100 records.
High Incidence of Error Messages - Provides an alert when the number of error messages generated by the pipeline passes 100 records.
